head.title: COVID-19 – Coronavirus – Miami Area Unified School District #40

meta.name: description
meta.content: Miami Unified School District #40 serves students and is located in Miami, AZ.

li.a: Out of Focus Productions YouTube Channel
National School Lunch Program - Media Release

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 2560px; height: 1250px;

span.strong: Miami Unified School District will post

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-weight: bold; color: #cf000f; text-decoration: underline

span.strong: to the Coronavirus here. Please visit this page for all developments that could impact our families and schools.
The School District will also communicate information via automated phone calls.
Below you will find time line information releases. Click on the .PDF to view.
